post.title: Raspberry Pi *3
post.body:
Starting to become super geeky here, running 3 Raspberry Pi's
One Pi3 with kodi, my mediabox
One Pi3 with openmediavault, testing en learning NAS stuff, a bigger NAS is planned
And one Raspberry Pi 1 with PiFace, to learn Python code.

Now i have to find time to keep gaming too... life is so tough... *sighs softly*
